air-jordan-3-valor-blue.name: VALOUR BLUE
air-jordan-3-valor-blue.abtprod: The Air Jordan 3 Retro 'UNC' looks to Michael Jordan's college days for inspiration. As a result, the shoe's white leather upper is accented by hits of Valor Blue, while the toe and heel sport elephant print overlays. Underfoot, more Valor Blue emerges on the midsole above the visible Air unit.

jordan-mars-270-london.name: JORDAN MARS 270 LONDON
jordan-mars-270-london.abtprod: For the most part, Beaverton’s hybridized Jordan Mars 270 silhouette has sort of been utilized as a modernized interpreter of retro colorways.

air-jordan-1-zoom-racer-blue.name: RACER BLUE
air-jordan-1-zoom-racer-blue.abtprod: First teased shortly after December 2019’s “Fearless Ones” release, the second Air Jordan 1 Zoom is finally dropped on March 14th.
